name: Militant Inquisitor
originalText: Militant Inquisitor gets +1/+0 for each Equipment you control.

rulings.text: Militant Inquisitor’s ability counts all Equipment you control, regardless of whether they’re attached to a creature.
Militant Inquisitor’s ability applies in addition to any effects from those Equipment that are attached to it.

text: Militant Inquisitor gets +1/+0 for each Equipment you control.
